title: SubhanAllah, Alhamdulillah, AllahuAkbar should not be said 33 times and must be said TOGETHER?
transcript: Nazar from India sh I heard from an IM that it's supposed to be said Subhan Allah alhamdulillah abbar after every prayer and not each of them separately as Subhan Allah 33 times and then alhamdulillah 33 times and so on is it authentic to be no it is not authentic this this person who said this doesn't know what he's talking about you can do either way you can say Subhan Allah Subhan Allah Subhan Allah 33 times and you can say Subhan Allah alhamdulillah allahar 33 times and this is all valid
